channel.title: Owner spell

item.title: Owner spell
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I’ve decide to make an owner spell, and it works for me on people but I want it to work on npc’s also, so I found the npc magic area of my code and added this-

stillgfx(572, absY, absX); //Hole in ground stillgfx(571, absY, absX); //Dust storm stillgfx(582, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2+4, EnemyX2-1); //498 = Fireball stillgfx(498, EnemyY2-4, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+4); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2-4); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-4); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+4); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2+4, EnemyX2); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2-4, EnemyX2); stillgfx(547, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2-1); //547 = Exploding bomb with smoke stillgfx(547, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(547, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(547, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(437, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-1); // 437 = Retribution stillgfx(437, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(437, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(437, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); // 287 = HUGE Explosion stillgfx(287, EnemyY2+3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2-3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+3); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-3); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(287, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2-2); //Flames stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2-3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2+3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2-2); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+2, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-2, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2-3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2+3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+1, EnemyX2+3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-1, EnemyX2-3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+3, EnemyX2-1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-3, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2+3, EnemyX2+1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2-3, EnemyX2-1);

But the spell doent do anything, just a 0 with no gfx.
Anyone know whats wrong?
